title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - the perfect travel companion for your 1-3 day trips! 

This hardside underseat luggage is made of durable ABS hard shell material, ensuring that your belongings stay protected throughout your journey. The steel rod handle provides a sturdy grip while maneuvering through crowded airports. 

Choose from a variety of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple to suit your personal style. With a spacious capacity of 33 liters, you can easily pack all your essentials without any hassle. 

The dimensions of this luggage are 21.85 inches in length, 8.35 inches in width, and 14.76 inches in height, making it the perfect size to fit under most airplane seats. 

Don't worry about the weight, as this luggage only weighs 5.62 pounds, allowing you to effortlessly navigate through your travels. The 360 degree silent double spinner wheels make it easy to glide through any terrain, ensuring a smooth and comfortable journey. 

For added security, this luggage features a TSA lock, giving you peace of mind knowing that your belongings are safe and secure. 

But that's not all! The interior of this luggage is designed with your convenience in mind. It includes a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your belongings organized and in place. The full capacity design allows you to maximize the space and easily access your items. 

With its lightweight construction, high durability, scratch resistance, and various user-friendly features, the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" is the perfect travel companion for elderly folks who want a reliable and easy-to-use luggage option. Don't let confusion hold you back - travel with ease and style!
